talks given.title: Just in Time Usability
talks given.description: Isral Duke presents why accessibility is important for business. He also presents 10 things that site owners can do to quick check their site’s accessibility and usability. Presented at a local ecommerce group lunch.

talks given.title: Accessible, Friendly Content
talks given.description: Isral Duke demonstrates how iOS and MacOS VoiceOver presents a simple web page. This talk promotes the use of semantic, meaningful markup to make a better user experience. Presented at Google Developer Groups.

talks given.title: Building Pelican Design System
talks given.description: Isral Duke presents version one of Pelican Design System. He talks about how it was created, and what’s coming next in version two. Presented at SQL Saturday.

education.title: Master of Science, Information Technology, Web Design
